name: Tagline
storyline:
The A.V.A.F (anti-vandal-attack-force) has plans to clean up this city once and for all by wiping away the graffiti that populates its streets. This municipal force won't hesitate to flush out the filth along with your new crew. It's time to take the fight to them.

Help a cast of hand animated characters fight back against the A.V.A.F by taking on missions across open level city districts. Use the old train routes to move around this loud, wild world as you discover the secrets of the TAGGERS, a group of street artists lost to time.
summary: Tagline is a lightning fast, graffiti based shooter set in a loud, wild world sprinkled with street art, hip-hop, and towering skyscrapers. Parkour and snatch the tags off the walls of this funky metropolis, and overcome an array of enemies and challenges!
